summary: This document is an email from July 8, 2019, containing a link to a Washington Examiner news article. The article reports that the daughter of former FBI Director James Comey has been named to the prosecution team handling the Jeffrey Epstein case in the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: James Comey
persons.context: Mentioned as the father of an individual named to the Epstein prosecution team. His daughter's appointment is the subject of the linked news article.

events.title: News Article on Prosecution Team Appointment
events.description: A Washington Examiner article reports that the daughter of former FBI Director James Comey has been named to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York team prosecuting Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York
keyFacts: An email dated July 8, 2019, contains a link to a Washington Examiner news article.
The article reports that the daughter of former FBI Director James Comey was appointed to the Epstein prosecution team.
The prosecution is being handled by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The document itself is minimal, serving primarily as a vehicle to share a news link.
